title: Regal Neelam Vaddanam Pendant - A Touch of Sapphire Splendor
materials: Natural Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
features: Intricate filigree work around the bezel, featuring a floral diamond and gold lattice pattern. Center stone is a dazzling Neelam. The oval shape is perfect for adorning a Vaddanam or can be worn as a striking pendant. The bottom features a series of small lotus (padma) motifs. Modern design infused with traditional South Indian essence.
description: This captivating pendant embodies the perfect blend of tradition and modern elegance. The rich rose gold complements the vibrant Neelam and sparkling diamonds, creating a luxurious statement piece. The filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship, ensuring lasting beauty and value. The Neelam is believed to bring good fortune and prosperity, making this pendant a treasured heirloom.
